overview: The Spanish construction industry might have hit something of a bad patch in recent years, but you can take it as read that the bunch of fit blue-collared fuckers in Raw Builders are determined to pound some life back into it! David Sky, Mike Cole and Mark Fontana join up with hired hand Titus Snow for some of the hottest and horniest outdoor action imaginable. Director Timmy Treasure lets them put their bricklaying skills to one side in favour of raw action of a distinctly carnal nature. Hard hats at the ready, these boys are ready to drill until they cream!
title: Raw Builders
